description:
When an Earthling wakes up from cold sleep, there is a futuristic galactic empire.

Inside of an isolated spaceship, in which an enigma was seen, an artificial intelligence program called BISHOP was found by the protagonist. With the common sense of the 21st century, a strangely virtuous artificially intelligent robot, a mechanic girl stuck with a gold, a virgin fellow, and a habit of having a habit of earning money, their aim is the hometown far away in the galaxy, the solar system’s third planet, the Earth. Meanwhile, they fund a corporation to manage the company they’d started. The transport company of adult toys has made a big war on a galactic scale.

From transportation of erot*c videos to mining, production, trade…>
